- I'm sweet. - You're not sweet. - I'm sweet. - You're not.
- Bitch, I'm sweet. - You know what?

translation.en: Much obliged, motherfuckers.
What the hell is that shit, playing quick- draw games when my ass is getting shot at?

translation.es: más rápido que tú, un tal Cherokee Bill.

translation.en: You hearsay. You don't see- say.

translation.en: So I say fuck Cherokee Bill.
translation.es: Así que a la mierda con Cherokee Bill.

translation.en: You know, rather than complaining, you should be applauding my performance.

- I know. - Black lips are beautiful lips.

Your half- brother, calm down. Look like your day going a little bad.

Rufus in Yuma for the rest of his natural life.

Wolf Lady?

On your feet.
Exhale.

Maybe you'll win.
Let's see.

Stop right there.
I said stop.
Put the weapon down, boy.

Ten!

Open the door.
I said open the damn door.
Here we are.
My dear battalion.

Any bullets coming through that door will hit him first, okay?

translation.en: You let that soldier go immediately.

Oh, that sounds like fear talking, Mr. Officiant of the Goddamn Law.

translation.en: And we done already hurt a couple people.

translation.en: or your little kin here shall perish.
Harm him further and I will kill every last one of you godless sons of bitches.

translation.en: Goddamn, Trudy. You know I like my countdowns.

Six.

Three.

Kill a particular Officiant of the Goddamn Law.

Pa! No, no, no, no, no.
Pa.

I said--

translation.en: Just a pipe.

Only after I kill a man.

translation.es: Buscaba a la banda de las Capuchas Rojas por el robo de un banco en Kansas City.

translation.es: Les robas a los que lo hacen, es igual para mí.

I was in Texas at the time of that robbery.

translation.es: Siempre que se robó un banco, yo estuve en Texas.

translation.es: son parte de la nueva banda de Rufus Buck, Nat.

translation.en: Rufus in Yuma.

translation.es: ¿Y parlotea aquí y se bebe mi whisky

translation.en: when you should be out rounding up your little deputies?
translation.es: en vez de reunir a sus ayudantes?

translation.en: 'Cause he been pardoned, Nat.
Rufus Buck been absolved of his countless depredations.

translation.es: no me enteré de esa noticia.

You shoot, he dead.
You miss,
all y'all die.
You, come here.
Take these cuffs. Cuff this man.
Or I put three in his chest right now, lessen the trouble.

translation.en: Go on.
Tell this young buck to back up.
Easy, Jim.
Everybody in here know who I am.
I'm taking Nat Love to Fort Smith to be tried.

translation.en: Anybody try to follow me,
y'all know what I do.
Come on.
Y'all enjoy the rest of the evening.

translation.es: Todos saben que robarnos es un suicidio.

Goddamn it. That just put us right back where we started.
translation.es: Maldita sea. Estamos como al principio.

We gonna have to take it out of our own bank.
translation.es: Habrá que sacar de nuestro banco.

translation.en: We don't have that type of money, Trudy.
We only got a few pennies over $2,500.
What did he say?
- 2,500-- - I heard you.
- Wiley. - Yeah.
Sure is hot, ain't it?
What's up, little man?
- You wanna see something? - Yeah.
Watch this now. Don't take your eyes off it.
translation.es: Mira esto. No lo pierdas de vista.

translation.en: Oh, it's still there!
Look at you.
Relic of yesteryear with nothin'.
translation.es: Una reliquia del pasado con las manos vacías.

translation.en: And you think you can roll into my town and take what belong to me?
translation.es: ¿Crees que vendrás a mi pueblo a quitarme lo mío?

translation.en: Who the fuck you think I am, huh?
Ain't nobody scared of you and ain't nobody runnin'.
translation.es: Nadie te tiene miedo ni huye.

translation.en: I'm a sinister motherfucker too.
One click of my finger and you disappear.
So I suggest you leave…
translation.es: Así que te sugiero que te vayas

translation.en: before I finish my steak.
translation.es: antes de que termine el bistec.

translation.en: - And if you even think about sticking-- -
translation.es: Y si te atreves a quedarte…

translation.en: Come in.
What is it, Carson?
Sheriff, Mr. Buck wants to see you out front.
translation.es: Sheriff, el Sr. Buck lo espera afuera.

translation.en: Tell that man I ain't got nothing to say to him.
translation.es: Dile que no tengo nada que hablar.

translation.en: It wasn't a request.
You wanna sell this town while I rot in prison?
translation.es: ¿Quieres vender el pueblo mientras me pudro en prisión?

translation.en: The world you knew is gone.
translation.es: El mundo que conociste no existe.

translation.en: There's a flood comin'.
Do you think you can hold onto this place when it hit?
translation.es: ¿Crees que entonces podrás aferrarte a este lugar?

translation.en: At least I know enough to get mine and get out.
translation.es: Yo, al menos, tomaré lo que es mío y me iré.

translation.en: Kill me…
and you'll have nothing.
You know, a man like you will have us all subservient
translation.es: A un hombre como tú tendríamos que servirlo

translation.en: till the end of our days
so's long as you can buy yourself a house,
translation.es: para que se compre una casa,

translation.en: a badge, and them goddamn gold teeth.
translation.es: una placa y esos malditos dientes de oro.

translation.en: You want to do this here?
There you go. That's what you want, right?
That's what you came here for?
I won't disappoint you. Come on.
That's what you want. Want some more?
You want some more, right? You want some more?
Come here, motherfucker.
Here you go.
Oh shit. I done hit gold.
Hey, boy. Come here. Come, get that gold. Get that gold.
translation.es: Chico. Ven aquí. Levanta ese oro.

translation.en: All right. Tell your mama you rich now! Go ahead!
translation.es: ¡Dile a tu mamá que eres rico! ¡Ve!

translation.en: Now, I ain't gonna kill you, Wiley.
You and I were friends once.
But know this.
Redwood will never be yours, never.
Never.
Matter of fact, you ain't welcome here no more.
translation.es: De hecho, ya no eres bienvenido.

translation.en: Now…
I want you to vacate immediately or die where you lay.
translation.es: si no te largas de inmediato, mueres ahí donde estás.

translation.en: Say what?
That's right.
You coulda taken these off a while back. Yep.
Tell me something. How you know Rufus will be in Redwood?
translation.es: Dime. ¿Cómo sabes que Rufus estará en Redwood?

translation.en: He's taking that money from them Crimson Hoods.
translation.es: Por el dinero de los Capuchas Rojas.

translation.en: That's where he'll be.
Now you teaming up with a marshal to bring him in.
translation.es: Y te asocias a un alguacil para arrestarlo.

translation.en: I ain't bringing him in. I'm bringing him down.
And we ain't teaming up, old man.
Your life's expendable, Marshal. My gang's ain't.
translation.es: Tu vida es prescindible. La de mi banda no.

translation.en: Shit, since we're out here, I oughta tell you…
I was fixin' to kill you…
when you and your fellas brought in Rufus.
A lot of men be fixin', son.
They always seem to die before they get the job done.
Just for the record…
I took Rufus in alone.
I figured you'd be halfway to Fort Smith by now.
translation.es: Creí que ya estarían camino a Fort Smith.

translation.en: You can put that gun down, Marshal. This ain't a ambush.
translation.es: Puede bajar el arma, alguacil. No es una emboscada.

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might wanna keep yours handy.
translation.es: En cambio tú, tenla a mano.

translation.en: Do you think I'm stupid enough to fall for that bullshit y'all pulled in my saloon?
translation.es: ¿Me crees tan tonta como para engañarme con eso que fingieron en mi cantina?

translation.en: I don't want you mixed up in this no more.
translation.es: No quiero que te metas más.

translation.en: Then you shoulda told me so.
I must confess to some raw feelings myself.
translation.es: Yo mismo debo confesar cierto malestar.

translation.en: This ain't no road to ask a friend to travel.
translation.es: No es misión para un amigo.

translation.en: Now you take that money we took off them Crimson Hoods
translation.es: Toma el dinero de los Capuchas Rojas

translation.en: and you buy that ranch you always blabbing about. Hmm?
translation.es: y cómprate el rancho del que siempre hablas.

translation.en: That's mighty generous of you, but that ain't how this gang work.
translation.es: Eres muy generoso, pero así no funciona la banda.

translation.en: Take stays in the usual place, ready to be shared three ways when we come back.
translation.es: Guárdalo en el lugar de siempre, lo dividiremos en tres al volver.

translation.en: Ain't no coming back from this.
Now get out of here.
All of you. This ain't your fight.
You take on the Devil himself, you gonna need more than you and the marshal.
translation.es: Es el diablo en persona, con ustedes dos no basta.

translation.en: I seen the Devil, and Rufus Buck ain't him.
translation.es: He visto al diablo, y no es Rufus Buck.

translation.en: Devil's white.
You got a reason you wanna die, Jim?
Outside of you saving me from this?
Besides, Monroe said Cherokee Bill run with Rufus.
translation.es: Además, Monroe dijo que Cherokee Bill está con Rufus.

translation.en: Every time I speak on my speed,
a motherfucker wanna pull Cherokee Bill out they ass.
translation.es: siempre un hijo de puta habla de Cherokee Bill.

translation.en: I'ma put a end to that argument once and for all.
translation.es: Pondré punto final a la discusión.

translation.en: Like they say in the Book of Clarence, No man out- speed me.
translation.es: Como dicen en El libro de Clarence: Nadie es más rapi que yo.

translation.en: Out- speed ain't a word, and Clarence ain't no book.
translation.es: Ni rapi es palabra ni eso es un libro.

translation.en: I'm hopin' Cherokee put a bullet in your ass just to shut you up.
translation.es: Ojalá Cherokee te calle de un balazo.

translation.en: - Hey. - You left these on my wall, Mr. Love.
translation.es: - Oye. - Las dejó en mi pared.

translation.en: Figured we going after villains, you'll need 'em.
Obliged.
What y'all waiting around for?
You think destiny is comin' to you?
Hyup! Go!
- Yeah. I know. -
Go ahead.
♪ Wahala they go Wahala they come ♪ ♪ Wahala they ride Wahala they run ♪ ♪ Wahala they sing Wahala they call ♪
How do I look?
All right.
Everybody out there?
Just about.
How could you do it?
Leave all of this to Wiley?
If you were runnin' Redwood,
who woulda kept the operation goin'?
Who else woulda kept all them gangs in line?
translation.es: ¿Quién tendría a raya a tantas bandas?

translation.en: Look, I know that Wiley got his ways, but he was loyal once.
translation.es: Mira, sé que Wiley actuó a su antojo, pero una vez fue leal.

translation.en: Loyalty is a virtue, Rufus.
translation.es: La lealtad es una virtud, Rufus.

translation.en: Till it ain't.
You loyal to me?
See these folk here?
Either they can't see it or they don't want to.
translation.es: No pueden o no quieren verlo.

translation.en: But I believe in what you're doing.
translation.es: Pero yo creo en lo que haces.

translation.en: This place can be the promised land for us.
translation.es: Este lugar puede ser nuestra tierra prometida.

translation.en: And as long as that so, ain't nothing I won't do to see it through.
translation.es: Y mientras siga así, haré lo que sea para llevarlo a cabo.

translation.en: You tell them.
Citizens of Redwood.
A new day is dawning.
As by now you have doubtless learned,
the territory will officially open up for settlement.
translation.es: abrirán oficialmente el territorio para asentarse.

translation.en: Now they say everything we own is gonna stay our own.
translation.es: Dicen que todo lo que poseemos seguirá siendo nuestro.

translation.en: But you know as well as I do how much that's worth.
translation.es: Pero todos sabemos que son solo promesas.

translation.en: See, your land, your businesses, your homes
translation.es: Su tierra, sus negocios, sus hogares,

translation.en: has all been promised to the highest bidders
translation.es: todo fue ofrecido a los mejores postores

translation.en: by your one- time sheriff, Wiley Escoe.
translation.es: por Wiley Escoe, su antiguo sheriff.

translation.en: Now, Mr. Buck can prevent this from happening.
translation.es: El señor Buck puede evitar esto.

translation.en: But in order for us to do that, it's necessary that we levy a tax.
translation.es: Pero para hacerlo, necesitamos cobrar un impuesto.

translation.en: - - At what cost to us?
You could scrape every penny from every living soul in this town,
translation.es: Aunque le sacaran hasta el último centavo a cada ser vivo del pueblo,

translation.en: and it wouldn't come near to that.
You got us between a rock and a hard place.
translation.es: Nos ponen entre la espada y la pared.

translation.en: How long you been alive in this country?
A rock and a hard place is what we call Monday.
translation.es: Siempre estamos entre la espada y la pared.

translation.en: I've heard of Rufus Buck.
How bad a man he is.
But he got himself thrown in jail once before,
and I reckon he'll be back there again soon enough.
translation.es: y creo que pronto lo volverán a arrestar.

translation.en: When he is, maybe I'll come back to this town.
translation.es: En ese momento, quizá yo regrese.

translation.en: 'Cause I ain't paying shit.
You think I made Redwood for myself?
To what end?
Redwood ain't a hiding place, 'cause I don't hide.
translation.es: No es un escondite. Yo no me escondo.

translation.en: It ain't a dream. I don't dream.
translation.es: No es un sueño. Yo no sueño.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It's an example.
It's an example…
for others to follow.
And you…
you are an enemy of progress.
Please. Please.
- I got a family. - What's your name?
Rest in peace, James.
Now, how much?
How much can be gathered?
Ten thousand.
Maybe 15, if every last cent can be squeezed.
translation.es: Quizá quince, dejándonos sin un centavo.

translation.en: Ain't nobody leave town until we collect it all.
translation.es: Nadie deja el pueblo hasta que recolectemos todo.

translation.en: And if you fail to comply,
you and everything you love will burn.
translation.es: será quemado con todo lo que ama.

translation.en: I ain't got nothin' to rob.
But I got somebody to shoot.
translation.es: Pero yo tengo a alguien para disparar.

translation.en: Step down.
Fuck.
Redwood crawling with gunmen.
Rufus came with 12 and took six of mine.
translation.es: Rufus llegó con 12 y reclutó a seis míos.

translation.en: Who knows how many he got by now.
I don't believe a thing this man sayin'.
translation.es: No creo nada de lo que dice.

translation.en: He a scout. I say we kill him.
And we take the rest of them teeth.
You ever shot a sheriff, boy? A mayor?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez mataste a un sheriff? ¿A un alcalde?

translation.en: Little harder than shootin' regular folk. And I'm both.
translation.es: Es más complicado que matar a alguien común. Y yo soy ambas cosas.

translation.en: You both alive and dead 'cause Rufus don't like loose ends.
translation.es: Tú eres hombre muerto, a Rufus no le gustan los cabos sueltos.

translation.en: Law don't find a man like Rufus Buck unless you got inside information.
translation.es: La ley no encontraría a Rufus Buck sin información privilegiada.

translation.en: Ain't that right, Wiley?
If I had my way, you'd be right up under the jail next to Rufus.
translation.es: Si fuera por mí, estarían juntos en la cárcel.

translation.en: But you cut yourself a deal, wound up wearing a badge instead.
translation.es: Pero hiciste un trato y terminaste con una placa.

translation.en: You got your reasons you want Rufus gone, and I got mine.
translation.es: Tienen sus razones para matar a Rufus, y yo tengo las mías.

translation.en: Ain't the enemy of my enemy my friend?
translation.es: El enemigo de mi enemigo es mi amigo.

translation.en: Rufus tryin' to save Redwood. But for that, he need money.
translation.es: Rufus quiere salvar a Redwood. Pero necesita dinero.

translation.en: And that's one thing he ain't have.
All right, look here. You made a deal with the Devil.
translation.es: Bien, escucha. Hiciste un trato con el diablo.

translation.en: Now he come to collect.
You rest up, but be gone before sunup.
translation.es: Descansa, pero vete antes de que salga el sol.

translation.en: Or it's gonna go from bad to badder. You hear?
Marshal. Marshal. Marshal.
All them tricks'll get you killed, son.
translation.es: Esos juegos harán que te maten.

translation.en: Listen, Marshal.
I'm faster than any weapon. You can trust in that.
translation.es: Soy más rápido que cualquiera. Tenga fe.

translation.en: I seen faster.
All right. Where?
In the mirror.
Negro said, In the mirror.
I'm so… I'm sorry.
I rather ride into a gun battle on a dark horse over a golden stallion.
translation.es: Prefiero ser el ganador sorpresa antes que alguien tan vistoso.

translation.en: - Fuck that mean? - Shiny shit get shot.
translation.es: - ¿Qué significa eso? - Al vistoso le disparan.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
What you think about that, lawman?
I think y'all gonna die.
♪ And away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
♪ As her garden grows ♪
♪ Hold those flowers close ♪
♪ For away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
I'll be back with information by sunup.
translation.es: Volveré con información antes del alba.

translation.en: Information from where?
Redwood.
You know we can't trust Wiley's word.
Someone's got to get the lay of the land before we make our next move.
translation.es: Alguien tiene que reconocer el terreno antes de hacer algo.

translation.en: Yeah, Mary, but that somebody ain't got to be you.
Every gunhand in the territory's gonna recognize you the second you hop off your horse.
translation.es: Te reconocerán todos los pistoleros apenas desmontes.

translation.en: Same with Bill and Beckwourth.
translation.es: Sería igual con Bill y Beckwourth.

translation.en: In case you forgot,
your face more famous than all of ours put together, Stagecoach Mary.
translation.es: tu rostro es más famoso que los nuestros juntos, Stagecoach Mary.

translation.en: Got it up on advertisements for that saloon of yours from here to Texas.
translation.es: Está en los anuncios de tu cantina, desde aquí a Texas.

translation.en: Which is why I can ride into town in plain sight.
translation.es: Por eso puedo ir a plena luz del día.

translation.en: Everybody knows I'm buying saloons.
translation.es: Saben que compro cantinas. Rufus necesita dinero.

translation.en: Rufus need money. I'ma make him an offer on Trudy Smith's place--
translation.es: Saben que compro cantinas. Rufus necesita dinero. Le haré una oferta por…

translation.en: Mary, what in my character makes you think I'll allow that?
translation.es: ¿Qué rasgo mío te hace pensar que lo permitiré?

translation.en: I'm not asking for your permission.
All right.
Then I… I guess I'll just be asking you for yours.
translation.es: Entonces, yo te lo pediré a ti.

translation.en: Since you'll never let a man give you away, I just have to ask you direct.
translation.es: No dejarás que un hombre te entregue, así que te lo pediré directamente.

translation.en: That's the ring my father gave my mother.
translation.es: Mi padre se lo dio a mi madre.

translation.en: I was gonna give it to you back in Douglas.
translation.es: Te lo iba a dar en Douglas.

translation.en: But you didn't.
I am now.
I used to hate feeling helpless over you.
Those days are over now.
When the dust settles, we gonna go our separate ways, for good.
translation.es: Cuando se calmen las aguas, no nos veremos más.

translation.en: But not till the dust settles. I'm here till then.
translation.es: Pero hasta entonces. Mientras, aquí estaré.

translation.en: See you sunup.
Are you a resident of Redwood, ma'am?
You don't own a gun confident enough to ask where I reside.
translation.es: No eres tan bueno con el arma como para preguntarme eso.

translation.en: Well, this gun say answer the damn question.
translation.es: Bueno, esta arma dice que responda.

translation.en: Well, this gun don't talk.
Ghastly Gertrude Smith.
I prefer Treacherous Trudy myself, but I'll take it.
translation.es: Prefiero Aterradora Trudy, pero está bien.

translation.en: What brings you to my town?
I heard Rufus Buck was back.
- News travels fast. -
I have an offer he might wanna hear about.
translation.es: Tengo una buena oferta para él.

translation.en: Well, any offer you got, you can make it to me.
translation.es: Cualquiera sea la oferta, puedes hacérmela a mí.

translation.en: I don't do business with the help.
Give me that shit.
Lead the way, Treacherous Trudy.
Speak your piece.
I assume you know who I am.
I assume you know who I used to run with.
Those days are over for me anyhow,
but I didn't get to be Stagecoach Mary Fields
translation.es: pero no sería Stagecoach Mary Fields

translation.en: without having my ears to the ground
translation.es: si no me enterara de todo,

translation.en: and my ears tell me you just lost 25 thou that was coming your way.
translation.es: y supe que acabas de perder $25 000 que te traían.

translation.en: I hope your proposal rivals your nerve--
translation.es: Que tu oferta sea como tu descaro…

translation.en: Allow me the latitude of completion.
My saloon in Douglas is boomin'.
translation.es: Mi cantina en Douglas es un éxito.

translation.en: Bought me another one in the Elks, and I got a restaurant in Cascade too.
translation.es: Compré otra en las Elk y un restaurante en Cascade.

translation.en: For the sum of all that, I could take this one off your hands.
translation.es: Por el total de eso, podría comprarte esta.

translation.en: The mere mention of my name brings forth good business
translation.es: El solo mencionar mi nombre genera buenos negocios

translation.en: to any establishment attached, whereas,
with all due respect, but the name Rufus Buck instils fear.
translation.es: con todo respeto, el nombre de Rufus Buck infunde miedo.

translation.en: We know who you are.
You walkin' into my town with that proposal is risky.
translation.es: Entrar a mi pueblo con esa propuesta es riesgoso.

translation.en: The kind of risk a woman such as yourself wouldn't tie herself to
translation.es: Y una mujer como tú no se arriesgaría así

translation.en: unless there was a whole lot more at stake.
translation.es: si no hubiera mucho más en juego.

translation.en: See, I don't believe in coincidence,
like you just gonna walk in here
translation.es: jamás vendrías aquí justo cuando a los Capuchas Rojas

translation.en: right after the Crimson Hoods get ambushed with my money.
translation.es: jamás vendrías aquí justo cuando a los Capuchas Rojas los emboscaron con mi dinero.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
You must have forgot whose name is on the door.
translation.es: No olvides quién es la dueña.

translation.en: Another round.
We havin' a party, y'all. Come on.
All right, Mary.
All right.
So you still sayin' you don't know nothin' about that money
translation.es: ¿Insistes en no saber nada del dinero

translation.en: and you done come here alone?
That's right.
You done rode all the way over here to get yourself killed.
translation.es: Cabalgaste hasta aquí para que te maten.

translation.en: And for what?
For love?
Love is the only thing worth dying for.
translation.es: Solo por amor vale la pena morir.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that.
translation.es: Pero tú no sabes nada de eso.

translation.en: You know, I had a sister named Mary.
translation.es: Tenía una hermana que se llamaba Mary.

translation.en: She was pretty, strong- willed, like you.
translation.es: Era bonita y obstinada, como tú.

translation.en: She died of polio when I was 11.
translation.es: Murió de polio a mis 11 años.

translation.en: Always was in pain, but she'd never let me see her cry.
translation.es: Siempre tenía dolores, pero nunca me dejaba verla llorar.

translation.en: There's this girl called Hope lived by us.
Big fat kid, always picking on the smaller kids.
translation.es: Era obesa y siempre molestaba a las más pequeñas.

translation.en: Obviously out of jealousy.
But she ain't never fuck with me though.
translation.es: Aunque a mí, nunca me jodió.

translation.en: She hated Mary with a passion,
translation.es: Odiaba a Mary con todas sus fuerzas.

translation.en: always teasing her about how thin and frail she was.
translation.es: Siempre se burlaba de ella por su delgadez y fragilidad.

translation.en: Then one day, Hope walkin' by our house,
translation.es: Un día, Esperanza pasaba por nuestra casa,

translation.en: apple in one hand, blade in the other.
translation.es: manzana en una mano, cuchillo en la otra.

translation.en: She decided to throw the apple across the street at Mary,
translation.es: Decidió tirarle la manzana a Mary, desde el otro lado de la calle.

translation.en: and it hit my sister in the head and knocked her out of balance.
translation.es: Le dio en la cabeza y le hizo perder el equilibrio.

translation.en: She fell down the steps.
Broke her ankle.
And now that…
that was the first and only time I physically seen my sister cry.
translation.es: Esa fue la primera y única vez que vi llorar a mi hermana.

translation.en: And there was Hope standing there laughin' her ugly fuckin' face off.
translation.es: Y Esperanza, parada allí, se reía con su horrible cara de mierda.

translation.en: My daddy…
he got home,
he took off his belt, and he beat me for not protecting my sister.
translation.es: y me golpeó con el cinto por no haber protegido a mi hermana.

translation.en: He lashed me until my whole body went numb.
translation.es: Me azotó hasta que se me entumeció todo el cuerpo.

translation.en: Then
he went to Hope house to do the same thing to her.
translation.es: fue a la casa de Esperanza para hacerle lo mismo.

translation.en: When he got there, he saw her whole family standin' on the side of the house,
translation.es: Cuando llegó, encontró a toda su familia, a un lado de la casa,

translation.en: all of 'em screamin' and cryin',
and there was Hope…
lyin' on the floor in a pool of blood.
translation.es: tirada sobre un charco de sangre.

translation.en: Somebody had slit her throat. Killed her with her own knife.
translation.es: Alguien la había degollado, la había matado con su propio cuchillo.

translation.en: Daddy was speechless.
He ain't said a word to me when he came home.
translation.es: No me dijo nada cuando volvió a casa.

translation.en: The next day,
he sent me to live with my grandparents.
translation.es: me envió a vivir con mis abuelos.

translation.en: And then the next time I seen my sister,
translation.es: Cuando volví a ver a mi hermana,

translation.en: she was laying in a coffin.
Disease had killed her.
I'm sorry your sister had to suffer.
translation.es: Lamento el sufrimiento de tu hermana.

translation.en: I admire her bravery.
But you get no words from me.
translation.es: Pero no tengo nada que decir sobre ti.

translation.en: You know, I actually admire your bravery.
translation.es: En realidad, yo admiro tu valentía.

translation.en: But I'm afraid the outcome is still the outcome.
translation.es: Pero me temo que no haya vuelta atrás.

translation.en: Hope must die.
But not yet.
Leave her out here in the street so everybody can see her.
translation.es: Déjala aquí en la calle para que todos la vean.

translation.en: No one come to collect her 'fore sunup, put a bullet in her head.
translation.es: Si no vienen por ella al alba, dispárale en la cabeza.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Looks like we don't have to wait that long.
Whoever die first, right?
- Whoever die first. - Mmm- hmm.
Get her up.
Whoever die first?
Now, what kind of dumbass saying is that?
You two trying to get shot out here?
Nat Love. How predictable.
You predict my friend Bill Pickett aiming at your bowler cap?
translation.es: ¿Predijiste que mi amigo Bill Pickett le apunta a tu bombín?

translation.en: You'll be dead before your boys get their aim.
translation.es: Estarás muerta antes de que tus chicos apunten.

translation.en: And you die right after.
But your boss won't see one red cent of that money.
translation.es: Pero tu jefe no verá un centavo del dinero.

translation.en: My boss?
Where is he?
Where is who?
Marshal.
I'm speakin' English, yeah?
- Sound like English to me. - Mmm- hmm.
Where's Rufus Buck?
If I'd known you were switchin' sides, I'da asked you to come join us.
translation.es: De haber sabido tu cambio de bando, te habría pedido que te nos unas.

translation.en: You here for your damsel in distress?
You don't look hard of hearing.
translation.es: No pareces tener problemas de audición.

translation.en: So I'ma ask you again.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Well, clearly, you don't know me.
translation.es: Es obvio que no me conoces.

translation.en: Tell your men to go,
translation.es: Si le dices a tus hombres que se vayan,

translation.en: but you stay,
and maybe your damsel will live a little longer.
translation.es: quizá tu damisela viva un poco más.

translation.en: Marshal.
You're pretty though.
- Ah, take her ass back in there. - Yes, ma'am.
translation.es: - Que vuelva a entrar. - Sí, señora.

translation.en: Gonna get me a drink.
Hey.
That the quick draw I hear tell about, Cherokee Bill?
I hear you so fast that your opponents ain't got time to draw
translation.es: Dicen que eres tan rápido que nadie desenfunda

translation.en: before you put two in they back.
translation.es: antes de que lo mates por la espalda.

translation.en: No, that ain't me.
I'm the Cherokee Bill that shoots men in the mouth that talk too much.
translation.es: Soy el Cherokee Bill que les dispara en la boca a los habladores.

translation.en: I'll make it easy for you, then.
You draw first.
That what you think this is? Who the quickest draw in the West?
translation.es: ¿Crees que importa quién es el más rápido del Oeste?

translation.en: All comes down to who fast and who ain't, right?
No, it all comes down to who's alive and who's dead.
translation.es: No, todo se reduce a quién vive y quién muere.

translation.en: Trudy, I'm gonna get me something to drink.
Good night.
Hey, hey, drink, my ass, man.
- I practiced that standoff all night. - Jim.
translation.es: - Practiqué el duelo toda la noche. - Jim.

translation.en: - You're not about to walk away. - Get out of here.
- No, nobody-- - Get out of here, Jim.
- That chicken-- - It ain't the time.
Okay. Okay.
March, boy.
- I said march! - March.
Hup, two, three, four.
That's enough.
They beat you bad?
I'ma kill 'em all.
You familiar with Napoleon?
He said, I am driven towards an end that I do not know.
translation.es: Dijo: Estoy yendo hacia un final que no conozco.

translation.en: As I reach it, as I shall become unnecessary,
an atom shall suffice to shatter me.
translation.es: y un átomo será suficiente para hacerme añicos.

translation.en: Until then, all forces of humankind can do nothing to stop me.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, no habrá fuerza de la humanidad que me detenga.

translation.en: That's a man who knew exactly who he was.
translation.es: Un hombre que sabía quién era.

translation.en: Most importantly, he knew that his time would come to an end.
translation.es: Lo más importante es que sabía que su tiempo llegaría a su fin.

translation.en: Cut him down.
You know why…
I gave you that scar?
So I'd remember you.
No, I gave you that scar so I can know your face when you come back to me.
translation.es: Te la hice para reconocer tu cara cuando volvieras a mí.

translation.en: the outlaw who robs outlaws,
translation.es: el forajido que roba a los forajidos,

translation.en: the angel of death who hunts down those who trespass against him with no mercy.
translation.es: el ángel de la muerte que persigue sin misericordia a quienes lo ofenden.

translation.en: I know who you are.
And I see the line that you won't cross.
translation.es: Y conozco el límite que no cruzarás.

translation.en: See, I know what's on the other side.
translation.es: Yo sé lo que hay del otro lado.

translation.en: Apologize for the beating.
It was more of an indication for what Ms. Fields might see
translation.es: Fue solo una muestra de lo que ella verá

translation.en: if we fail to come to terms.
translation.es: si no llegamos a un acuerdo.

translation.en: What terms?
You will return the money you stole from me by Friday noon.
translation.es: Me devolverás el dinero antes del mediodía del viernes.

translation.en: Not a moment later.
And you will add $10,000 on top of that. We'll call that interest.
translation.es: Y le sumarás $10 000 a modo de intereses.

translation.en: Somethin' funny?
Ooh, shit, how… how you reckon I'ma get that?
You're gonna rob a bank.
Nat Love is gonna rob a bank.
In the meantime, here's a little token of my appreciation in advance.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, ten un adelanto en muestra de mi agradecimiento.

translation.en: Go ahead, open it.
I expect my money on Friday.
All of it.
You know I can't let you do that.
If that money ain't in Rufus' hands in three days, Mary'll die.
translation.es: Si Rufus no recibe esa cantidad en tres días, Mary morirá.

translation.en: What bank we talking about anyway?  Maysville.
translation.es: - ¿De qué banco hablamos? - Del de Maysville.

translation.en: Maysville?
That's a white town. Yeah, which is why they gonna have $10,000 in their bank.
translation.es: - Es una ciudad blanca. - Por eso hay $10 000 en su banco.

translation.en: It's crazy.
My emotions are all types of confused.
I mean, Pickett, I agree. That's crazy.
But, Nat, I also agree with you telling the marshal that we gonna do that shit anyways.
translation.es: Y, Nat, concuerdo, digámosle al alguacil que lo haremos de todos modos.

translation.en: That's some true outlaw shit.
- We outlaws, ain't we? - Ain't no we, Jim.
Not after that shit you pulled in town nearly got us all killed.
translation.es: Casi nos matan por lo que hiciste en el pueblo.

translation.en: I had that.  Fetch that money you took from the Crimson Hoods.
translation.es: - Lo tenía controlado. - Irás por el botín de los Capuchas Rojas.

translation.en: Pickett, kid, you comin' with me.
If Rufus Buck want that bank took, why don't he send his own men?
translation.es: Si quiere ese banco, ¿por qué no manda a los suyos?

translation.en: This way he clean, see?
I gotta go in barefaced as day,
a freshly minted bank robber, face up on wanted posters all over the territory.
translation.es: un ladrón de bancos flamante con carteles de buscado por doquier.

translation.en: They'll be on you like flies on shit before you open the door.
translation.es: Caerán sobre ti como moscas a la mierda.

translation.en: Yep.
I said I had to be recognized.
translation.es: Dije que tenían que reconocerme a mí.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Hell no.
For Mary.
Close shave.
Close fucking shave!
I thought I was falling for a fella for a little bit.
translation.es: Creí que me estaba enamorando de un chico.

translation.en: That's why I didn't say nothing.
Well, I ain't the only one. I can't…
translation.es: No soy el único. No puedo…

translation.en: I can't… It wasn't just me. It wasn't just me.
It was just you, Jim.
Giddup now.
- Allow me. -
What's your real name?
Cuffee my real name.
Name I was born with? Cathay Williams.
You walk worse than you ride, Cathay.
translation.es: Caminas peor de lo que cabalgas, Cathay.

translation.en: Mr. Love, my momma always told me to respect my elders,
translation.es: Mi mamá me enseñó a respetar a los mayores,

translation.en: so I'm not gonna say what I'm thinking.
translation.es: así que no diré lo que pienso.

translation.en: That's all right. I can read your mind.
translation.es: Está bien. Te leí la mente.

translation.en: Then I'm sorry you had to hear that.
translation.es: Entonces, perdón por lo que pensé.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Go ahead, honey.
Yes?
I'd like to make a withdrawal.
What…
You have to have an account, ma'am.
translation.es: Tiene que tener una cuenta, señora.

translation.en: And, well, I'd recommend a bank in Jericho or maybe Redwood for that.
translation.es: Le recomiendo que la saque en un banco de Jericho, o quizá de Redwood.

translation.en: I'm not talking about that kinda withdrawal.
translation.es: No hablo de retirar de esa forma.

translation.en: I'm talk--
I'm talking about…
talking about that kind.
Hey, blue eyes.
You scared.
Your hand is shaking. You'll miss.
I won't.
Exhale.
Attaboy.
I ain't like my partner.
He don't wanna shoot nobody, but all of a sudden, I'm of a mind to.
translation.es: A él no le gusta disparar, pero a mí me dieron ganas de hacerlo.

translation.en: Now open the fuckin' gate.
Think I'm funny now?
What you lookin' at?
Get all the customers over there.
- Get 'em over there! - Okay, okay.
- Everyone, please, this way quickly. - You too. Move!
Times have changed, ain't they?
They say robbing banks is hard work.
translation.es: Dicen que robar bancos es difícil.

translation.en: That's a lie. Robbing banks is easy.
The hard part is doing it without killing.
translation.es: Lo difícil es hacerlo sin matar a nadie.

translation.en: So, what'll it be…
Mr. Manager?
Good man.
Come on. Let's go.
Come on. Giddyap. Go.
- Pleasure banking with you. - Okay, sir.
translation.es: - Un gusto negociar con usted. - Bien, señor.

translation.en: Don't even look like much.
Ain't what it look like. It's what it can buy you.
translation.es: No importa qué parece, sino qué te compras.

translation.en: Rufus won't let Mary go once he gets that money.
translation.es: Rufus no liberará a Mary cuando tenga el dinero.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it.
He'll kill her, let me go, so's I carry that hurt with me.
translation.es: La matará y me dejará ir, para que cargue con el dolor.

translation.en: So what, we just went through all that trouble for nothin'?
Now we got something he want.
And that's it?
Gonna have to be.
You can be all hasty and shoot me now if you want,
or you can wait to see what I brought with me first.
translation.es: o esperar a ver qué traigo.

translation.en: Rufus got stashes like this all across these hills.
translation.es: Rufus esconde cosas así por todas estas colinas.

translation.en: Enough for a small army.
Don't nobody take what I got coming to me.
translation.es: Nadie toma lo que es mío.

translation.en: Not even the Devil himself.
translation.es: Ni siquiera el diablo en persona.

translation.en: Rufus Buck is a man.
Y'all best reconcile yourselves with that fact.
Man or devil, this gonna be Buck's last day amongst the living.
translation.es: Hombre o diablo, será el último día de Buck entre los vivos.

translation.en: ♪ Upon my return ♪ ♪ See a changed soul ♪
translation.es: De regreso voy. Otra alma soy.

translation.en: - ♪ That road was far ♪ - ♪ That road was far ♪
translation.es: - El largo andar… - El largo andar…

translation.en: - ♪ And way too long ♪ - ♪ And way too long ♪
- ♪ They'll run from me ♪ - ♪ They'll run from me ♪
translation.es: - Huirán de mí… - Huirán de mí…

translation.en: - ♪ As they ran from you ♪ - ♪ As they ran from you ♪
- ♪ That fear in me ♪ - ♪ That fear in me ♪
translation.es: - El miedo en mí… - El miedo en mí…

translation.en: ♪ Is in a distant view ♪
♪ Is ♪
♪ In a distant ♪
♪ View ♪
Afternoon.
I would ask you to run go fetch your superior,
translation.es: Te pediría que corrieras a buscar a tu superior,

translation.en: but that'd be like asking you to run go fetch your daddy.
translation.es: pero sería como pedirte que llames a tu papá.

translation.en: It could be anybody, right?
You know,
I'm willing to bet my right arm
I've got a higher body count than yours.
translation.es: a que maté más gente que usted.

translation.en: That'd be a bad bet, son.
I fancy that song or whatever it was you was whistling there.
translation.es: Me gusta esa canción, o lo que sea que silbaba.

translation.en: Go, Jerry. Go.
That our money?
Walk with me.
Hey, just… just walk with me.
- Keep an eye on this, Angel. - Mmm- hmm.
You know they call your boss the Devil hisself?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que a tu jefe le dicen el diablo?

translation.en: Even the Devil needed money, right?
So being as how we are in possession of that money…
translation.es: Y teniendo en cuenta que estamos en posesión de ese dinero,

translation.en: let me dictate the terms of engagement.
translation.es: quiero imponer las condiciones del arreglo.

translation.en: What the fuck was that? What the fuck was that, old man?
Is that the right arm or the left?
Oh man.
Well, now there's us…
and there's y'all.
You get a hold of your feisty buddy here.
You got a little rowdy rascal.
- Mary. - Yeah, we'll get to that.
- We gonna count this first. - Now, Cherokee.
translation.es: - Antes hay que contarlo. - Ahora, Cherokee.

translation.en: Or your boss gonna be one quick draw and $35,000 short.
translation.es: O a tu jefe perderá los $35 000 y un pistolero veloz.

translation.en: All right.
Unhitch this horse so's Mary can ride out.
translation.es: Que Mary se vaya en el caballo.

translation.en: - You always move so slow? - You always talk so much?
Really?
In the back?
What you think, Beckwourth?
Nah, he wouldn't do that
'cause then I would have to put a bullet in his cranium.
translation.es: porque yo le dispararía al cráneo.

translation.en: And we'll never know who the fastest really is now, will we?
translation.es: Y no sabríamos quién es más rápido, ¿no?

translation.en: I gotta hand it to you, boy.
You do know how to make a grand entrance.
translation.es: Sabes cómo hacer una entrada grandiosa.

translation.en: Shit, I didn't even rehearse that one.
You know, quick draw, Nat Love is a dead man walking.
translation.es: Pistolero, Nat Love es hombre muerto.

translation.en: But you don't have to be.
translation.es: No tienes por qué serlo tú.

translation.en: Why don't you get on your horse, get your shit,
translation.es: ¿Por qué no montas con tus cosas

translation.en: and go back to whatever it is you call home?
translation.es: y vuelves a lo que sea que llames hogar?

translation.en: You know that's impossible.
Count down from five?
Five…
Four…
Three…
Why do they always have to count so slow?
Jim!
Blow that bitch, Bill!
Kill her.
Mary!
Push!
Trudy's mine.
Let's go.
Son of a bitch!
Exhale, motherfucker.
Come on.
- Where'd they get you? - Shoulder. Get down!
Matches.
You wanna smoke now?
Matches, Bass.
Okay.
Jump, motherfuckers.
Fuck it.
I always knew it was you
who gave me up.
God knew my heart.
Goodbye, old friend.
Rufus, I didn't have a choice--
I told that kid. Them damn tricks…
translation.es: Le advertí sobre esos malditos juegos.

translation.en: - Sorry, ladies. -
- You all right, Cuffee? - Just need to reload.
You look hurt, Mr. Pickett.
Ain't nothing but a flesh wound. Maggie ain't ready for me today.
translation.es: Es solo un rasguño. Maggie no me espera hoy.

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'll be damned.
Pickett!
Now, why you got that look on your face?
No. No, no, no, brother, no, no, no.
Stop that. Don't do that.
You had a choice.
You always got a choice.
Being scared will only give you bad karma in the afterlife.
translation.es: Tener miedo solo te dará un karma malo en el más allá.

translation.en: He didn't even have a chance, you son of a bitch!
translation.es: ¡No tuvo ninguna oportunidad, hijo de puta!

translation.en: You gonna shoot me in the back too? Or cheat the count?
translation.es: ¿Me matarás por la espalda? ¿Harás trampa con la cuenta?

translation.en: Beckwourth was faster.
Look after my friend.
Nat.
Don't miss.
Pick up your guns.
I know what it is now.
It's the eyes.
Pick 'em up, I said.
Your father,
he was a good man?
He was.
And my mother was a good woman before you cut 'em down.
translation.es: Y mi madre era una buena mujer antes de que los mataras.

translation.en: Seems we had a different upbringing.
I don't care how you was raised.
Now pick up your guns and turn around.
translation.es: Toma tus armas y date vuelta.

translation.en: I used to watch my father beat my mother to a pulp
translation.es: Mi padre golpeaba salvajemente a mi madre

translation.en: if she overcooked his food.
translation.es: si cocinaba de más la comida.

translation.en: He cut her up real good if she undercooked it too.
translation.es: También se enojaba si la cocinaba de menos.

translation.en: One day, I decided to intervene,
and he turned his wrath on me.
translation.es: y él descargó su ira conmigo.

translation.en: My father was not a good man.
translation.es: Mi padre no era un buen hombre.

translation.en: Not a good man. He was an outlaw.
translation.es: No lo era. Era un forajido.

translation.en: Robbin' banks…
He liked to drink.
My mother took a bottle and cut him to protect me.
translation.es: Mi madre tomó una botella y lo cortó para protegerme.

translation.en: He lashed back at her, and just like that, she was gone.
translation.es: Él la atacó, y como si nada, ella murió.

translation.en: Then, like the coward he is,
he took everything we had and left,
translation.es: se fue con todo lo que teníamos

translation.en: leaving me with my…
my mother.
I was ten years old, you know…
about the same age you was…
when I gave you that scar.
I had to fend for myself, but I became who I am,
translation.es: Tuve que crecer solo, pero me convertí en quien soy,

translation.en: just like you.
As I did, all I could ever think about is wanting my father to pay for what he did.
translation.es: En tanto, solo quería que mi padre pagara por lo que hizo.

translation.en: I searched for him for years and years, and I could never find him.
translation.es: Lo busqué años y años y jamás pude encontrarlo.

translation.en: It's like he disappeared off the face of the earth.
translation.es: Parecía que lo hubiera tragado la tierra.

translation.en: I ain't stop though. I kept looking…
translation.es: Pero no me detuve. Seguí buscando…

translation.en: until I did find him.
One day…
lo and behold,
there he was, my father,
a new man.
He was clean now.
Sober.
Man of God.
Had a church.
He had a pretty little wife.
And he had a son,
about the age of ten years old,
whose eyes blazed like mine.
translation.es: sus ojos brillaban como los míos.

translation.en: You're lyin'.
You're lyin'!
Killing our father was retribution, but--
translation.es: Fue justo matar a nuestro padre…

translation.en: My father!
My mother!
But it weren't enough.
Letting you live,
that was the true revenge.
Every sin you made, every bank you robbed, everybody you killed.
translation.es: Cada pecado que cometiste, cada banco que robaste, todos los que mataste.

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
You everything he tried to run away from.
translation.es: Eres todo de lo que él quería huir.

translation.en: Changed his name to Love.
You a Buck.
You lyin'.
Just like me.
Just like him.
But you better. You gonna surpass even me because…
translation.es: Pero tú eres mejor. Incluso me superarás porque…

translation.en: I couldn't kill my brother.
translation.es: yo no pude matar a mi hermano.

translation.en: Yet here you are about to kill yours.
translation.es: Y tú estás a punto de matar al tuyo.

translation.en: It's time to take your revenge, Nathaniel Buck.
translation.es: Es hora de tu venganza, Nathaniel Buck.

translation.en: Go on.
Take your revenge.
- - Take your goddamn revenge!
You a Buck.
- Nathaniel-- -
Is the Devil dead?
I don't know.
All right, fellas.
You sure the law gonna believe he's dead?
translation.es: ¿En serio la ley creerá que murió?

translation.en: I'm the law, Ms. Mary.
If I say a man dead, he dead.
translation.es: Si digo que murió, es así.

translation.en: And you?
You sure this what you want?
I always kinda wanted to be a deputy, sheriff, marshal person.
translation.es: Siempre quise ser ayudante, sheriff, alguacil.

translation.en: What you lookin' at?
We got work to do, Mr. Love.
Let's go.
All right.
♪ And upon my return ♪ ♪ You’ll see a changed soul ♪ ♪ The road was far too long ♪
translation.es: “A LA MEMORIA DE MIS QUERIDOS HERMANOS, RICHARD ANTWI Y MICHAEL K. WILLIAMS”.
